markdownRemark.html: Examples can be confusing, especially when we assume they’re following some kind of best practices. But we must keep in mind that code samples are just minimal setup to achieve a specific task, and nothing else. It is not intended to be clean code, but rather to be clear enough to demonstrate the purpose it serves.

frontmatter.title: How to name event handlers in React
frontmatter.description: There might be a better naming than handleClick
